reviews.review:
Half Life 2, ja das ist halt noch ein echtes PC-Spiel.
Nicht so wie die meisten Spiele heut zu Tage, die meist schon interaktive Filme sind.
In Half Life 2 muss man die Welt erkunden, teilweise Rätsel lösen und Feinde erledigen um weiter zu kommen.
Die Atmospähre ist einfach super, auch wenn die Grafik schon etwas angestaubt ist.
All time classic
This is the best game I've ever played.

Consiglio questo gioco a tutti, soprattutto a chi si affaccia al mondo degli FPS. 
Questo gioco deve essere giocato per qualsiasi motivo. Bel gameplay, bella trama, bella grafica (il motore grafico anche se del 2004 può essere comparato con un qualsiasi motore grafico del 2011). In questo gioco tutto è curato al massimo. Unico contro il doppiaggio scandaloso in italiano.

Probably the greatest game I have ever played!

Even now, after countless playthroughs over many years, I still feel that great sense of joy and discovery I experienced on my first playthrough!

PROS

* Superb, rich story set in a highly convincing and lived-in totalitarian state.
* Extremely varied and satisfying shooter mechanics.
* The benchmark game for the use of physics in games.
* Wide variety of gameplay segments set across one seamless experience, whether it be shooting, driving or escaping a zombie infested town.
* Non-playable characters YOU WILL care about.
* Still visually impressive to this day, and not much PC muscle required to run nowadays.
* Many years later, Valve are still working to improve the game, with improved FOV and Ultrawide options.

CONS

*It ends.
*The last couple of chapters in the game, whilst fun, are just not quite up there with the rest of the game, and the ending is sadly quite weak, especially in comparison to the groundbreaking game you just spent many hours experiencing.
just amazing

Wake up and smell the ashes.

Game's a classic. Like it's predecessor, it revolutionized the genre back when it first came out, with a never before seen integration of physics and gameplay. They showed off what their new (new being 2005) physics engine can do and brought along a brilliant game. The game's so brilliant, imo, that even today, despite being over 10 years old, it's still worth the play. Not gonna lie, the graphics are a bit dated, and the physics is more often than not rather buggy, but there's a really fun game underneath, and the physics of the game is very unique, even compared to titles today. Definitely worth the play, and imo Valve's greatest title.

My logged Hours do not actively reflect how much I absolutely love this game. This was always my go to game to play when the internet went down, or when other games ended up boring me. This might not be everyone's cup of tea, but to me, there isn't really any other game that pushes the limits on what a game truly is. If you have not tried it already, I HIGHLY recommenced giving MMOD a try, as it makes the combat feel far more visceral and enjoyable 10+ years later.

No need to be long winded in this recomendation for obvious reasons. This is probably the most praised FPS of all time. Constantly mimiced, and forever loved this game has shaped FPS's to a level that few games have. The story, the characters, the gun feel, the level design, the lore, the puzzles, the replayability. Ever aspect of this game is stellar. This is an example of game that did everything right (even marketing!).
A very fun challenge. Also a classic.
If you have never played this game and don't plan to, please leave Steam now
Probably as close to perfection as can be.

One of the most immersive, breathtaking stories of all time. Considering it's a video game, I have never been so attached to characters in my life until I played this game. It should be a crime not to own this game, because Half-Life 2 proves that despite being a (for the most part) linear game, it can still be one of the most enjoyable games you could own. With graphics that exceed all expectations considering it was released in 2004, and a story that constantly makes you want more, Half-Life 2 proves that games are still an art form.

Todos esses anos e HL 2 contiua atual, espetacular e botando muito jogo da geração atual no chinelo. 

Com toda a certeza entra brincando na lista dos 10 jogos mais espetaculares da história.

This game always felt ridiculously stable and smooth to me and it really helped me appreciate not only the game mechanics but the stunning visuals and compelling storyline at the time. I'd definitely give it a try if you enjoy a little futuristic puzzle shooter. Unfortunately it IS one of those games where your quirky and enjoyable 'friends' ditch you every time the action starts. When I was a kid and played this, I don't really think I could appreciate it the way I do now.  With great visuals, gameplay, level design, and an interesting story to boot; I can see why this game is considered one of the best.  There are a few problems with the pacing and the physics, but I think this game is still amazing.  Almost everyone has played it, but if you haven't, you should.  9/10

[h1]Nota 23/12/2014: 10/10[/h1]

El juego perfecto. De verdad, si te gustan los juegos, y sobretodo los FPS "clásicos" ( dónde no tienes vida infinita y tienes que ingeniártelas para no morir en el intento ), deberías jugar obligatoriamente a este juego. Es una mezcla perfecta de muchos elementos como los ya mencionados ( vida y armadura limitada ), con conducción que para su época era muy buena, sistema de físicas espectacular y variedad de armas que afectan en su totalidad al gameplay. Lo malo... bueno, lo malo es que Gabe Newell es un grandioso troll, y ya sabéis de lo que hablo...

En cuanto a la historia, un breve resumen sería el siguiente:
Tras los acontecimientos ocurridos en Black Mesa ( Half Life "1" ) y después de haber quedado en estado de "suspensión temporal" al haber "aceptado" un contrato con un misterioso hombre llamado G-Man, te devuelve al mundo real, devastado por una invasión extraterrestre de otra dimensión y con la raza humana casi esclavizada y muy controlada. Apareces en un tren dónde ves todo el caos que hay nada más salir de él, pero, tras una serie de acontecimientos, te encuentras con una resistencia humana y vortigaunt ( raza extraterrestre de la misma dimensión que los invasores, que fueron esclavizados de manera parecida a los humanos ) que quiere acabar con ese estado de opresión contra la humanidad y tú serás clave para que eso se cumpla. Ah, y todo eso sin decir ni pío.
